title: Inoculating Grain Spawn from Midwest Grow Kits - Bulk Growing Series (pt. 1)

tasks.task: Cultivating mushrooms using spore syringes in a modified plastic bin (monotub)
subtasks: Sterilizing and setting up the working environment to minimize contamination
Opening spawn bags carefully without piercing the plastic
Preparing the spore syringe and ensuring proper aseptic technique
Disinfecting the injection needle before each bag inoculation
Dispensing spore solution uniformly across the spawn surface in each bag
Monitoring incubation conditions and recognizing signs of contamination
Addressing potential contamination issues by identifying affected spawn bags
